summary: This is an email from Tom Moyer of Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP to an individual named Alex, transmitting on behalf of Deutsche Bank an additional production of documents in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena from the SDNY. It includes a link to the document production and an attached cover letter.

persons.name: Tom Moyer
persons.context: Attorney from Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP sending an email to transmit Deutsche Bank's document production in response to a subpoena.

persons.name: Alex
persons.context: Recipient of the email from Tom Moyer, presumably a prosecutor or investigator from the SDNY who issued the July 11, 2019 subpoena.

connections.description: Tom Moyer, representing Deutsche Bank, is communicating with Alex regarding compliance with a subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena Issued to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The SDNY issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, likely for documents related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Additional Document Production
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its counsel, submitted an additional production of documents in response to the SDNY subpoena.

keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was responding to a subpoena from the SDNY dated July 11, 2019.
The law firm Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP was representing Deutsche Bank in this matter.
The document production was transmitted via a secure file-sharing link on September 20, 2019.
The communication indicates an ongoing investigation by the SDNY into matters involving Deutsche Bank and Jeffrey Epstein.
An updated production index was to be provided separately the following week.
